alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:21PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BERGEN...SOUTHERN WESTCHESTER AND ROCKLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 220 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hackensack, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hackensack, Bergenfield, Tarrytown, Dobbs Ferry, Nyack, Tappan, Englewood, Oradell, Norwood, Orangeburg, Teterboro, Teaneck, Garfield, Lodi, and Dumont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
